overview.title: Bank Account & Cheque Management
overview.subtitle: Manage your bank accounts, create cheque books, assign cheques to safes, and track settlements all in one place. Our automated system handles overspending and settlements seamlessly.

setupNew.title: Set Up New Bank
setupNew.description: Add a new bank account and create your first cheque book with our guided setup wizard.

viewHistory.description: Track all settlement activities, audit trails, and historical transactions.

step1.title: Set Up Bank Account
step1.description: Add your bank account details and configure account settings.

step2.title: Create Blank Cheques
step2.description: Generate blank cheque ranges with custom prefixes. Amounts are filled when creating expenses.

step3.title: Assign to Safes
step3.description: Distribute cheques to different safes and operational locations.

step4.title: Automatic Settlement
step4.description: System handles overspending with automatic settlement and audit trails.
